I didn't receive this game for since I had bought it with a gift card a long time ago when it wasn't free but it's even better that it's free now and I definitely still recommend this game

9/10
A Great FPS & Holds Up Even Now

Pros-
-Constant Updating By Valve
-Big Skill Gap that encourages Growth
-Refined FPS with few lasting major bugs and issues
-Doesnt Require A High End PC
-Decent Graphics
-Big Skins Market for those who want to look fancy
-Good Gun Play and smooth feel
-Fast gameplay

Cons-
Terrible base ranked matchmaking 
Somewhat Toxic Playerbase 
Casual is poor 10v10 Cluster Fight
Lots of cheaters especially in wingman and the casual gamemodes

Roundup-
Csgo is a mainly competitive game with very few eggs in casual play as can be seen with the amount of cheaters in casual and cluster fight of casual 10v10 the only good gamemode is comp, and valve has a terrible matchmaking system making it very hard to climb ranks unless extremely good, have a smurf account or play in a 5 stack, the only good matchmaking is seen in unofficial matches.
All in all csgo is a timeless classic with a fairly stable playerbase constant updates and events and good gameplay that rewards skill and effort.
